DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : During lactation , several physiological modification occur include cellular differentiation proliferation , well elevation inflammation . The role Mediterranean ( MED ) diet rich walnuts show favorably modify fatty acid profile reduce inflammation . The study goal evaluate anti-inflammatory effect MED diet rich walnut lactation , time increase inflammatory response . Procedures : A randomized , control dietary intervention trial among lactate woman compare effect Mediterranean-style diet walnut USDA 's MyPyramid Diet Moms commence determine effect diet fatty acid profile biomarkers inflammation breast milk material serum/plasma . Secondary outcomes interest include effect maternal diet assignment maternal body weight body composition well infant ' growth health study trial period . Population : The study population include healthy woman age 18-40 year within 6 month post-partum plan breastfeed minimum 3 time per day 6 month follow study entry . There total 138 participant enrol study . All 138 participant woman ; 34 identify Hispanic , 104 say Hispanic .
DOC.brief_title: The Mediterranean Diet Lactation Study : A Diet Study Lactating Women
DOC.criteria: plan breastfeed 3 time daily 6 month nut allergy history cancer , renal disease , liver disease , diabetes smoke
